customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Hey there, partner! I see we're both in good spirits â€” that's perfect for a relaxing game of cards!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Navia's deck is built around the Crystallize reaction. She can use it and "draw card" effects to greatly increase the burst DMG "Navia'"s Skills can deal.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

The eyes of the vulture, the soul of the lion, the free daughter of the desert.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Pretty good, partner! Playing against you is as enjoyable as making a spinning tower of multi-flavored macarons together, and I could do that all day!"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Navia" starts with the Talent Card "Undisclosed Distribution Channels" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.text: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Navia
value.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , attaches <color=#ffffff>Geo Infusion</color> to this character. <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> up to 5 <color=#ffffff>Crystal Shrapnel</color> from your Hand. Each card you <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> causes this to deal +1 DMG, and you draw 1 card.
<color=#ece5d8>Geo Infusion</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

talent.key: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
talent.title: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby. Summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Rosula Dorata Salute</color> and creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Crystal Shrapnel</color> card before adding it to your Hand.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) <color=#ffffff>After an opponent's character takes Crystallize reaction DMG:</color> Create 3 <color=#ffffff>Crystal Shrapnel</color> and randomly place them into your deck.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
Deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> to the opponent's active character and draw 1 card.

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , draw 1 <color=#ffffff>Crystal Shrapnel</color> card.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
